search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Salesflare (salesflare.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Salesflare can be found at: [https://salesflare.com/pricing](https://salesflare.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
CRM Pricing Plans | Salesflare
===============
          

 

[![Image 5: Salesflare logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66debba50fa44d1b1acdb82f/66e05847d8b123ab9b8c7747_Logo.svg)](https://salesflare.com/)

Product

###### Sales CRM software

*   [Sales tracking](https://salesflare.com/sales-crm/tracking)
*   [Email integration](https://salesflare.com/sales-crm/email-integration)
*   [Customizable dashboards](https://salesflare.com/sales-crm/reporting)
*   [Mobile app](https://salesflare.com/sales-crm/mobile-app)
*   [Team collaboration](https://salesflare.com/sales-crm/collaborative)

###### Sales intelligence software

*   [Relationship intelligence](https://salesflare.com/sales-intelligence/relationship-intelligence)
*   [Data enrichment](https://salesflare.com/sales-intelligence/data-enrichment)
*   [AI suggestions](https://salesflare.com/sales-intelligence/ai-crm)

###### Sales engagement software

*   [Email sequences](https://salesflare.com/sales-engagement/email-sequences)
*   [Email templates](https://salesflare.com/sales-engagement/email-templates)
*   [Email & web tracking](https://salesflare.com/sales-engagement/email-tracker)

###### Lead generation software

*   [LinkedIn integration](https://salesflare.com/lead-generation/linkedin-crm-integration)
*   [Lead finder](https://salesflare.com/lead-generation/lead-finder)
*   [Chrome extension](https://salesflare.com/lead-generation/chrome-extension)
*   [Email finder](https://salesflare.com/lead-generation/email-finder)

[Pricing](https://salesflare.com/pricing)[Customers](https://salesflare.com/customers)

[Try it for free](https://salesflare.com/pricing#)[Login](https://salesflare.com/pricing#)

Plans & Pricing
===============

Choose your CRM plan
--------------------

Get everything you need to unleash your sales team's potential.

Bill monthly

Bill annually

$

€

Growth
------

$35
---

/month

$29
---

/month (save $6)

###### per user

All CRM features you’d expect, plus:

*   Automate your CRM data input
    
    Salesflare will automatically gather contact and company info from emails, email signatures, social profiles, and more. It will also log your meetings and phone calls for you.
    
*   Track emails, links and website visits
    
    Salesflare not only tracks when people open your emails and click on them; it also shows you which pages these people visit on your site, when and for how long. Just install the email sidebar and website tracking script.
    
*   Get a LinkedIn sidebar, email sidebar & mobile app
    
    Salesflare works right in LinkedIn as well as your Gmail or Outlook inbox, and has a mobile app for iOS and Android too. All of this without losing any desktop features.
    
*   Send personalized email campaigns
    
    Send personalized emails at scale from any mailbox connected to Salesflare, track the results in the dashboards, and follow up on the replies.
    
*   25 email finding credits
    
    Find emails from within Salesflare and LinkedIn. Additional monthly email finding credits can be bought: 1500 for $39, 5000 for $79, or 15000 for $159.
    

[Try it for free](https://app.salesflare.com/#/signup/?campaign=pricing-website-pricing-growth-usd-signup)

Most Popular!

Pro
---

$55
---

/month

---

/month (save $6)

###### per user

All features on the Growth plan, plus:

*   Send workflows of multiple emails
    
    Follow up beyond the first mass or automated email. Send personalized email flows from any mailbox connected to Salesflare. And track the responses.
    
*   Set user permissions
    
    Take control of your team’s data. Restrict what your team can see, edit or delete. Give them access to specific pipelines only. Create view-only users. And assign managers to user groups.
    
*   Create custom dashboards
    
    Customize your Insights dashboards and learn from your data. Add custom reports, re-order them in the dashboard, and even create new dashboards.
    
*   500 email finding credits
    
    Find emails from within Salesflare and LinkedIn. Additional monthly email finding credits can be bought: 1500 for $39, 5000 for $79, or 15000 for $159.
    

[Try it for free](https://app.salesflare.com/#/signup/?campaign=pricing-website-pricing-pro-usd-signup)

Enterprise
----------

$115
----

/month

---

/month (save $16)

###### per user (with a minimum of 5 users)

All features on the Pro plan, plus:

*   Full setup and tailor-made training
    
    Get training that is customized for your team so you can get the most out of Salesflare in no time.
    
*   Data migration done for you
    
    We’ll take care of importing your current data into Salesflare for you, so you don't have to worry about it.
    
*   Dedicated account manager
    
    Get a single point of contact at Salesflare who follows up on your personal needs and questions.
    
*   Unlimited email finding credits
    
    Find emails from within Salesflare and LinkedIn.
    

[Try it for free](https://app.salesflare.com/#/signup/?campaign=pricing-website-pricing-enterprise-usd-signup)

Frequently asked questions
--------------------------

### How do I get my team to use this?

You send email invites to your team from inside Salesflare. Setup only takes a few minutes. Once your setup is complete, team members keep sending emails and scheduling meetings as usual – Salesflare will capture this activity and make it trackable for the whole team.

### Can I purchase for one month?

Yes, you can. Licenses for Salesflare are either billed monthly or annually. Monthly pricing is slightly more expensive, so if you are committed to improve your sales productivity: go for the annual plan. There is always a free trial!

### Do you charge for onboarding us?

No. Getting onboarded properly is key to your long term success with Salesflare and we are 100% here to help you with it, entirely free of charge. We're even happy to organize a one-on-one training session for your whole team. Just ask for it [on the chat](mailto:%20support@salesflare.com).

### Are there any features we need to pay extra for?

The pricing plans are exactly as listed above. There will be no features we will suddenly charge you extra for that will not be listed on this page. We consider these kinds of business practices to be deeply disrespectful to you as a customer.

### Are there any limits to the amount of contacts I can have?

In Salesflare, there are no hidden limits to the amount of contacts, users, email templates, tracked emails, sent emails, custom fields, workflows, dashboards, or even sales pipelines. We won't hit you with any unexpected financial surprises.

### What happens at the end of my trial?

We’ll notify you via email before your trial ends. If you become a paying customer, you don't need to make a new account. You can keep working with your account and all its data that you added during the trial period. Additionally, we’ll help you and your team to get fully onboarded and up to speed... for free.

### What is the cancellation policy?

You can cancel your ongoing plan whenever you want and you’ll stop being charged immediately. There is no need to sign a multi-year contract, or to alert us months before the next renewal.

Award-winning CRM software
--------------------------

Salesflare has received numerous awards for its ease of use, ease of setup, ease of administration, and quality of support. These awards are based on hundreds of reviews by real users, who consistently rank Salesflare ahead of the competition.
